overview:
Seasoned entrepreneur with experience in building businesses with P&L responsibility.

Whitney’s goal is to globally inspire and enroll others in self-expression, activism and entrepreneurship!

Whitney founded The Music Producer and has been key in developing the overall strategy to build and grow the business. She previously founded Americas Business Link, LLC, a boutique international business development firm specializing in the Latin American and US Hispanic markets. In this capacity she has led and managed teams of consultants for various client projects (primarily start-ups) in multiple industry sectors including music and entertainment. She expanded her experience and professional contact base in the music and entertainment space through a previous client, Billboardlive International. For two years she taught Entrepreneurship and Small Business Management at Miami International University part-time. Whitney won the 2005 Innovative Use of Technology Award from the United Nations Association for hosting and producing 26 episodes of Global Connection TV. Whitney served as a 1995 Rotary Scholar to Argentina, White House Advance volunteer in South America, and White House Intern where she set up the International Correspondence Department of the Clinton White House.

degrees.subject: Washington Semester & World Capitols Program - National Governments
